price: “Kad će se već jednom obistiniti ta prijetnja, ako istinu govorite?”, pitaju oni.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
